name: Cat to the Beat
description:
A 2D top-down rhythm game.  You're a cat escaping from a laboratory.  

Everything moves to the beat.

How to play

Work your way through each room, avoiding the traps and slimes.  Make your way to the exit door.  You'll move once every beat of the song and so will the enemies.  Fire traps will charge up and fire every fourth beat.

You get 100 points for every room you complete and an extra 50 points for every half heart health remaining when the song ends.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Credits

Game design: worgenwow, nev9n

Level design: nev9n, worgenwow

Pixel art: nev9n, pneu, worgenwow

Programming: worgenwow, nev9n

Graphic design: callena

Includes music by Lightspeed6

This game was made 1 week for Rhythm Jam, Summer 2021.
